articles.author: Jacob Sonenshine
articles.title: Interest Rates Have Soared. That Could Put a Dent in Stocks Soon. - Barron's
articles.description: Rising interest rates are generally a sign of growing confidence in the economy, but if they increase too fast, it could hurt valuations for shares.
articles.content: Interest rates took off last week as investors grew more confident in an economic recovery. One problem: Stocks may be ill prepared for the increase. The yield on 10-year Treasury debt rose to 1.1% b… [+2899 chars]
